snippet: Investigators on Friday continued to search for more explosives and other weapons possibly hidden by three men arrested this week and accused of having links to Al Qaeda and planning terrorist attacks.
abstract: Investigators in Spain continue to search for more explosives and other weapons possibly hidden by three men arrested and accused of having links to Al Qaeda and planning terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: Investigators on Friday continued to search for more explosives and other weapons possibly hidden by three men arrested this week and accused of having links to Al Qaeda and planning terrorist attacks.
